```py
# class definition
class PacktDataAug(object):
  def __init__(self,
    name="Pluto",
    is_verbose=True,
    args, **kwargs):
```

```py
# code snippet for verbose option
if (is_verbose):
  self._ph()
  self._pp(f"Hello from class {self.__class__} Class: {self.__class__.__name__}")
  self._pp("Code name", self.name)
  self._pp("Author is", self.author)
  self._ph()
```
